title: ALEX MD PhD 365 Age Defense Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid + Q10 + Vitamin E + Niacinamide | Free of Fragrances, Parabens, Oil, Dyes and Gluten | 1.7 Fl oz
features: Niacinamide - Helps rebalance pigmentation, refine pores and improve skin resilience.
Q10, Vitamin E - Anti-Aging properties and helps protect and support skin for prevention skin damage from UV radiation
Linoleic Acid, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, phospholipids - Supports the skin's barrier repair function
Cupua√ßu Butter - antioxidant flavonoids and a variety of phytosterols, moisture-retention to help improve elasticity and softness of hair and skin

Phytomoist - Made from plant derived ingredients, it is 400x as moisturizing as sodium Hyaluronate. It helps Improve skin softness and moisturization as well as diminishing visible signs of fine lines usually associated with dry skin. Phytomist is very effective at diminishing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles due to its extreme moisturizing properties.
description: Clean, deep hydration meets powerful action for all skin types in this non-irritating formula. Antioxidants, anti-inflammatories and brighteners fight aging and support fresh, healthy skin. Free of fragrances, parabens, oils, dyes, gluen & drama. Due to sensitivity of some individuals to fragrances or essential oils, no masking agents are used to cover the scent of the ingredients in the formula. Utilizes unique airless jar dispensing technology for improved preservation of the ingredients. This design allows for minimal contact between skin and moisturizing cream for improved hygiene and dispensing of nearly all the product without waste.
